## utils.dom.removeClasses() function

Removes multiple calsses from an element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeClasses(element: Element, classNames: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM element to remove classes from. |
|  classNames | string | A string of one or multiple class names for an element.  Blockly.utils.dom.removeClasses |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
